name: Ask: The protector of Anomaly
description:
Ask : the protector of anomaly ,takes us to the adventures of  Ask , as she has been summoned by the almighty gods as the last protector of anomaly. She  is in search for the anomaly inorder to protect it.

The whole environment is set around an island filled with mazes, trees, temples. Can Explore the whole map within 40 minutes 

Basic Requirements:

~  Compatible with Windows 7, 8.1,  10 , 11

~ 4GB Ram (Minimum)

~ i3- Processor

~ Integrated graphics card (required)
